channel.title: How do i make a closed Client?
channel.description:
Hey guys, im nearlly ready to publish my server, im just wondering, how do i make my client closed??
Regards Johno[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2009, 12:12:44 pm[/size][hr]Oops, can you move this please?

item.title: How do i make a closed Client?
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

you delete all .java files and then compress it to a jar file and then release it

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a closed Client?

item.title: How do i make a closed Client?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

All you need to do is delete all your Java files but I’d recommend you move them to a different folder just in case you need to edit your client again.

Read full topic
